title: Pillars of Eternity Linux delta patch (GOG0
description:
Taken from GOG forum. Not my work only uploaded.
 <a href="
https://www.gog.com/forum/pillars_of_eternity/linux_unofficial_patches/page1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
https://www.gog.com/forum/pillars_of_eternity/linux_unofficial_patches/page1</a>


So now for the patching method: 
1. download the .lrz file for your game version 
2. open a terminal in the directory containing the .lrz archive 
3. uncompress it via the following command:

lrunzip poe-linux-patch_1.0.0.1_1.1.0.2.delta.lrz 
4. patch your game via the following command:

rdiffdir patch /some/path/to/Pillars of Eternity/game poe-linux-patch_1.0.0.1_1.1.0.2.delta 
5. just wait a little while for the magic to happen, when your prompt comes back, your game is patched ;)
